findings.title: Deployer can mint any new tokens
findings.description: The deployer has unrestricted access to mint new tokens, which could lead to unintended token creation and potential security risks.

findings.title: Deployer can burn or lock user funds
findings.description: The deployer has the ability to lock user funds by setting _maxTxAmount to 0, which can cause loss of user funds.

findings.title: Deployer can pause the contract
findings.description: The deployer has the ability to pause the contract, which could lead to unintended consequences.
